summary: Follows three generations of a curse farming community that turn to human sacrifice to appease an evil that haunts the rain.
cast: David Carradine|Richard Lynch|Dee Wallace|Jeff Beorger|Christopher Bondy|Derek Brandon|David G.B. Brown|James Howard Carr|J.J. Chidiac|Paula Ciccone|Peter Coady|Adam Cooper|Daniel Cooper|Guy Copland|Colin Crenshaw|Didrik Davis|Jimmy Doom|Maddie Dorsey|William C. Fox|William Giordano|Sasha Higgins|Jillian Hoffman|Kristen Jarzembowski|Tiren Jhames|Patrick Kelly|Natalie Light|Natalie Light|Mary Malaney|Max|Caden Miller-Baker|Andre Neebnagezhick|Heidi Philipsen|Ellen Sandweiss|Hope Crenshaw|Molly Howe|Carol Ilku|Tevis R. Marcum
title: The Rain
